body.p: To His Excellency the Governor of Kentucky

John P Beal having been fined the sum of $17.00 before Wm Cox Justice of the peace for Carroll County for assault & Battery upon Tho D Wright. We the undersigned from our knowledge of the facts and circumstances believing that said fine was improperly imposed on said Beal and that he acted in self defence and as a Justice of the peace of the County to suppress a breach of the peace. respectfully pray your Excellency to remit said fine
Oct 26. 1863.

We the undersigned Petitioners do say that the said J. P. Beal is a well ordered citizen and is a man that is not able to work for a living and is not able to pay the fine Even if it was justly approved but buy unjustly impose we that it not right he should pay the sum -- you will Examine your Executive Journal you will find he has been Elected Justice of the Peace of Carroll County.
We Come begging your honor to remit the fine for the sake of his family

MColyer
R. T. McCann
R. R. Gwinn
H. C. Hindheld
Allen Hanks C.C.C.C
A J Guthrie ast assessor 4 Dist Ky
W. G. Cline
J W Lingenfelt -- of Carroll County
Jno T. Lewis -- M.D.
C. M. Stringfellar
A. N. Carlisle= Pro. Mar. Carroll County Ky
O. Coburn
J A Crawford

Release done at to Carollton Ky
J. P. Been
